channel.title: Object Oriented Programming Concepts Using Java on BCA Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Object Oriented Programming Concepts Using Java on BCA Notes

item.title: Unit - 1
item.description: Introduction to Java History Features Application Types of Java Applications Hello World program Variables Data Types Primitive data types boolean data type byte data type char data type short data type int data type long data type float data type double data type Non-primitive data types Unicode Character set Defaults initial values wrapping of integer arithmetic casting comments identifiers and reserved words operators and operator precedence, examples and exercises

item.title: Unit - 2
item.description: Statements simple and compound Uses of control statements do for while switch break case continue label class type data: String Arrays example and exercises

item.title: Unit - 3
item.description: Definitions and naming conventions for the members f the JAVA classes instance fields and methods Initialization by constructor Initialization by Default constructor Multiple Definition of constructors creation of objects access methods Examples and exercises

item.title: Unit - 4
item.description: Inheritance Super class Sub class Method overloading interface thread Multithreading example synchronized Exception (try-catch-final blocks examples) examples and exercises

item.title: Unit - 5
item.description: Java Virtual machine concept Java Platform overview programming Examples to clarify use of object threads exceptions and packages for I/O file and string handling examples and exercises
